% test integration of the Python package `svglatex` with
% the LaTeX style `svglatex.sty`.
\documentclass[10pt]{article}
\usepackage{svglatex}
\graphicspath{{./img/}}
\begin{document}
\begin{figure}
\centering
\includesvg[width=0.6\textwidth]{./img/beautiful}
\caption{Nice caption.}
\label{fig:label}
\end{figure}
\end{document}
